name: Dithered
description: Explore the mysterious and almost dreamlike world of Dithered. Use every weapon, tool and item to survive against the threats of this world. Heat, feed, and defend yourself. And if that doesn’t work, put your food in bonfires. You can die, your food can spoil, and your base can be burnt to the ground. A world clouded in vast mystery is bound to be revealed at some point along your journey.
